name: BerkshireQuotes
0:
”Alexa, Open Berkshire Quotes”
”Give me a quote from Berkshire Quotes”
”Ask Berkshire Quotes to give me a quote”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: berkshire quotes
des:
Warren Buffett aged 85+ and Charlie Munger aged 95+ are running the largest company of the world (based on Networth) Berkshire Hathaway. They are running the company for the past 50+ years, by acquiring companies and buying stocks from other listed companies. They share their thoughts through Annual reports, Shareholder meetings and various interviews.

This skill gives the famous quotes given by both of them during the past 50+ years
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
